options.name: Get Primary Calendar
options.description: Get the primary calendar information for the current identity. API reference documentation: [Get primary calendar]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/calendar-v4/calendar/primary)

options.name: Create A Calendar
options.description: This API is used to create a shared calendar for the current identity (app or user). The identity is determined by the token type of Authorization in the header. API reference documentation: [Create a calendar]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/calendar-v4/calendar/create)

options.name: Obtain Calendar List
options.description: This API is used to obtain calendar list by pages under the current identity (app or user). The identity is determined by the token type of Authorization in the header. API reference documentation: [Obtain calendar list]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/calendar-v4/calendar/list)

options.name: Delete A Calendar
options.description: This API is used to delete a shared calendar as the current identity (app or user). The identity is determined by the token type of Authorization in the header. API reference documentation: [Delete a calendar]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/calendar-v4/calendar/delete)

options.name: Obtain A Calendar
options.description: This API is used to obtain calendar information by calendar ID as the current identity (app or user). The identity is determined by the token type of Authorization in the header. API reference documentation: [Obtain a calendar]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/calendar-v4/calendar/get)

options.name: Update A Calendar
options.description: This API is used to modify calendar information as the current identity (app or user). The identity is determined by the token type of Authorization in the header. API reference documentation: [Update a calendar]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/calendar-v4/calendar/patch)

options.name: Search For Calendars
options.description: This API is used to query public calendars or a user's primary calendar based on keywords. API reference documentation: [Search for calendars]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/calendar-v4/calendar/search)

options.name: Subscribe To A Calendar
options.action: Subscribe To A Calendar Calendar Calendar
options.description: This API is used to subscribe to a calendar as the current identity (app or user). The identity is determined by the token type of Authorization in the header. API reference documentation: [Subscribe to a calendar]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/calendar-v4/calendar/subscribe)

options.name: Unsubscribe From A Calendar
options.action: Unsubscribe From A Calendar Calendar Calendar
options.description: This API is used to unsubscribe from a calendar as the current identity (app or user). The identity is determined by the token type of Authorization in the header. API reference documentation: [Unsubscribe from a calendar]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/calendar-v4/calendar/unsubscribe)

options.name: Subscribe To Calendar Change Events
options.action: Subscribe To Calendar Change Events Calendar Calendar
options.description: This API is used to subscribe to all changes in the calendars under the current identity as a user. API reference documentation: [Subscribe to calendar change events]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/calendar-v4/calendar/subscription)

options.name: Create Access Control
options.description: This API is used to add access control (i.e., calendar members) to a calendar as the current identity (user or app). The identity is determined by the token type of Authorization in the header. API reference documentation: [Create access control]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/calendar-v4/calendar-acl/create)

options.name: Obtain The Acl
options.description: This API is used to obtain the ACL of a calendar as the current identity (app or user). The identity is determined by the token type of Authorization in the header. API reference documentation: [Obtain the ACL]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/calendar-v4/calendar-acl/list)

options.name: Delete Access Control
options.description: This API is used to delete access control (i.e., calendar members) from a calendar as the current identity (user or app). The identity is determined by the token type of Authorization in the header. API reference documentation: [Delete access control]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/calendar-v4/calendar-acl/delete)

options.name: Subscribe To Changes In Calendar Access Control
options.value: Subscribe To Changes In Calendar Access Control
options.action: Subscribe To Changes In Calendar Access Control Calendar Acl
options.description: This API is used to subscribe to calendar member changes in a calendar as a user. API reference documentation: [Subscribe to changes in calendar access control ]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/calendar-v4/calendar-acl/subscription)

options.name: Delete An Event
options.description: This API is used to delete an event from a calendar as the current identity (app or user). The identity is determined by the token type of Authorization in the header. API reference documentation: [Delete an event]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/calendar-v4/calendar-event/delete)

options.name: Obtain An Event
options.description: This API is used to obtain an event in a calendar as the current identity (app or user). The identity is determined by the token type of Authorization in the header. API reference documentation: [Obtain an event]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/calendar-v4/calendar-event/get)

options.name: Update An Event
options.description: This API is used to update an event in a calendar as the current identity (app or user). The identity is determined by the token type of Authorization in the header. API reference documentation: [Update an event]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/calendar-v4/calendar-event/patch)

options.name: Create An Event
options.description: This API is used to create an event in a calendar as the current identity (app or user). The identity is determined by the token type of Authorization in the header. API reference documentation: [Create an event]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/calendar-v4/calendar-event/create)

options.name: Obtain Event List
options.description: This API is used to obtain the event list of a calendar as the current identity (app or user). The identity is determined by the token type of Authorization in the header. API reference documentation: [Obtain event list]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/calendar-v4/calendar-event/list)

options.name: Search For Events
options.description: This API is used to search for events in a calendar as a user. The identity is determined by the token type of Authorization in the header. API reference documentation: [Search for events]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/calendar-v4/calendar-event/search)

options.name: Subscribe To Event Changes
options.action: Subscribe To Event Changes Calendar Event
options.description: This API is used to subscribe to event changes in a calendar as a user. API reference documentation: [Subscribe to event changes]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/calendar-v4/calendar-event/subscription)

options.name: Create Event Invitees
options.action: Create Event Invitees Calendar Event Attendee
options.description: Adds event invitees to an event in batch. API reference documentation: [Create event invitees ]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/calendar-v4/calendar-event-attendee/create)

options.name: Obtain Event Invitee List
options.action: Obtain Event Invitee List Calendar Event Attendee
options.description: Obtains the invitee list of an event. If the event invitee list contains groups, call the [Obtain the list of members of group invitees]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/calendar-v4/calendar-event-attendee-chat_member/list) API. API reference documentation: [Obtain event invitee list]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/calendar-v4/calendar-event-attendee/list)

options.name: Delete Event Invitees
options.action: Delete Event Invitees Calendar Event Attendee
options.description: Deletes event invitees from an event in batch. API reference documentation: [Delete event invitees]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/calendar-v4/calendar-event-attendee/batch_delete)

options.name: Obtain The List Of Members Of Group Invitees Of An Event
options.value: Obtain The List Of Members Of Group Invitees Of An Event
options.action: Obtain The List Of Members Of Group Invitees Of An Event Calendar Event Attendee Chat Member
options.description: Obtains the list of members of group invitees of an event. API reference documentation: [Obtain the list of members of group invitees of an event]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/calendar-v4/calendar-event-attendee-chat_member/list)

options.name: Query Availability
options.description: Queries the availability information of a user's primary calendar or a room. API reference documentation: [Query availability]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/calendar-v4/freebusy/list)

options.name: Create A Leave Event
options.action: Create A Leave Event Calendar Timeoff
options.description: Creates a leave event for a specified user. The event can be a common leave event or an all-day event. After a leave event is created, the leave information will be displayed in the personal signature page within a specified period of time. API reference documentation: [Create a leave event]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/calendar-v4/timeoff_event/create)

options.name: Delete A Leave Event
options.action: Delete A Leave Event Calendar Timeoff
options.description: Deletes a specified leave event. After a leave event is deleted, the leave information disappears from the personal signature page of the user. An app can only delete leave events created by the app. API reference documentation: [Delete a leave event]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/calendar-v4/timeoff_event/delete)

options.name: Generate Caldav Configuration
options.description: This API is used to generate a CalDAV account and password for the user to sync Lark calendar information to calendars on the local device. API reference documentation: [Generate CalDAV configuration]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/calendar-v4/setting/generate_caldav_conf)

options.name: Connect An Exchange Account
options.action: Connect An Exchange Account Calendar Exchange Binding
options.description: This API is used to connect an Exchange account to a Lark account. After the connection is created, you can import calendar data from Exchange. API reference documentation: [Connect an Exchange account]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/calendar-v4/exchange_binding/create)

options.name: Query The Connection Status
options.action: Query The Connection Status Calendar Exchange Binding
options.description: This API is used to query the connection status of an Exchange account, as well as whether calendar data is synced from Exchange. API reference documentation: [Query the connection status]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/calendar-v4/exchange_binding/get)

options.name: Disconnect An Exchange Account
options.action: Disconnect An Exchange Account Calendar Exchange Binding
options.description: This API is used to disconnect an Exchange account from a Lark account. The Exchange account can be connected to other Lark accounts only after it is disconnected. API reference documentation: [Disconnect an Exchange account]({{document_base_url}}/uAjLw4CM/ukTMukTMukTM/reference/calendar-v4/exchange_binding/delete)

name: acl_id
description: ACL resource ID. For details, see [Calendar-related IDs]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uETM3YjLxEzN24SMxcjN#f066a96c).

operation: Subscribe To Changes In Calendar Access Control
Subscribe To Changes In Calendar Access Control
Subscribe To Changes In Calendar Access Control
Obtain The List Of Members Of Group Invitees Of An Event
Obtain The List Of Members Of Group Invitees Of An Event
Obtain The List Of Members Of Group Invitees Of An Event

name: attendee_id
description: Group invitee ID. For details, see [Calendar-related IDs]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uETM3YjLxEzN24SMxcjN#f066a96c).

operation: Obtain The List Of Members Of Group Invitees Of An Event

name: timeoff_event_id
description: The ID that uniquely identifies a time off application. For more information, see [Calendar-related IDs]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uETM3YjLxEzN24SMxcjN#f066a96c).

name: exchange_binding_id
description: The ID that uniquely identifies a connection to Exchange. For more information, see [Calendar-related IDs]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uETM3YjLxEzN24SMxcjN#f066a96c).

name: exchange_binding_id
description: The ID that uniquely identifies a connection to Exchange. For more information, see [Calendar-related IDs]({{document_base_url}}/ukTMukTMukTM/uETM3YjLxEzN24SMxcjN#f066a96c).
